title: Accredited Investor
subtitle: SEC definition for private investment eligibility
content: An individual who meets income ($200k/yr) or net worth ($1M excl. primary residence) tests allowing them to invest in private placements.

title: Amortization
subtitle: Spreading cost of an asset or loan
content: Amortization is the process of gradually reducing a debt or intangible asset over time through scheduled payments or expense recognition.
